i solve the problem with // inset disc 4
Do like this.
1. Go to that location you extract it to.
2. click on the fs9 file and copy it.
3. Go to that location you installed your game and put the fs9 file into GAME folder.
4. Then try to run the game// (the fs9 file is the crack)
